title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 2
description:
I say "chapter three", but it's Chapter 2. My apologies.

Why learn to maintain your motorcycle? Here are two very good reasons. Plus, city vs. country boredom​, and are things getting unsettling?
